build: docker run --rm -it -v "$(pwd):/build" --platform linux/arm64 ethernix-builder:latest sh -c "mkdir -p out && ./scripts/build.sh && find /nix/store -name 'nixos-image-sd-card-*.img.zst' -exec unzstd -d {} -o out/ethernix.img \; && chown -R $(id -u):$(id -g) out"
echo 'Image built successfully. You can find `ethernix.img` in the `out/` directory.'
